title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

ecaActions.name: MATCH MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Applies the matching rules on the message

ecaActions.name: CHAIN MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Applies the chaining rules on the message

ecaActions.name: VALIDATE MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Checks if the message is SWIFT standard compliant

ecaActions.name: DUPLICATES CHECK
ecaActions.description: Prevents processing a duplicated message

ecaActions.name: SEND MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Sends the message to the EMISSION queue

postProcesses.statusComment: Error sending message to configuration ${IDENTIFIER} via ${TARGET}

ecaActions.name: REQUEST AUTHORIZATION
ecaActions.description: Changes the message status to waiting for approval

ecaActions.name: FORWARD AS AUTHORIZED
ecaActions.description: Marks the message as authorized by the system, and fires a message authorized event

ecaActions.name: FORWARD AS CREATED
ecaActions.description: Fires a created message event

ecaActions.name: PROCESS RECEIVED
ecaActions.description: Sets status to processed

ecaActions.name: PROCESS SENT ACTION
ecaActions.description: Sets status to delivered

postProcesses.statusComment: Outgoing message loaded, waiting for ACK

ecaActions.name: ABORT MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Changes the message status to deleted

ecaActions.name: RETURN MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Changes the message status to rejected

ecaActions.name: PROCESS ACK/NAK
ecaActions.description: Matches the ACK/NAK with the original sent messages and updates its status accordingly

postProcesses.statusComment: Transmission notification could not be matched with original sent message

ecaActions.name: PROCESS SYSTEM MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Matches the system message notification 010, 011, 012 or 019 with the original sent messages and updates its status accordingly

postProcesses.statusComment: System message notification could not be matched with original sent message

ecaActions.name: TRANSLATE MESSAGE
ecaActions.description: Translates the message into its MT/MX equivalence

ecaConditions.name: ALWAYS TRUE
ecaConditions.description: Condition without any filtering parameter

ecaConditions.name: IS USER-TO-USER MT
ecaConditions.description: Message is a user-to-user MT (categories 1 to 9), sent or receiver

ecaConditions.name: IS INCOMING
ecaConditions.description: Message is MT/MX received to SWIFT

ecaConditions.name: IS OUTGOING
ecaConditions.description: Message is MT/MX sent to SWIFT

ecaConditions.name: IS MT ACK/NAK
ecaConditions.description: Messages is an MT ACK/NAK system message

ecaConditions.name: IS MT SYSTEM MESSAGE
ecaConditions.description: Messages is a received MT system message (category 0)

ecaConditions.name: REQUIRES AUTHORIZATION
ecaConditions.description: Message require authorization

ecaConditions.name: CAN BE AUTHORIZED
ecaConditions.description: Messages can be authorized by approver

ecaConditions.name: CAN BE RETURNED
ecaConditions.description: Messages can be returned by approver

ecaConditions.name: CAN BE ABORTED
ecaConditions.description: Messages can be returned by approver

ecaConditions.name: IS DUPLICATE
ecaConditions.description: Messages is a duplicate

ecaButtons.name: Translate
ecaButtons.description: Translates the message to its MT/MX equivalent
